elements.name: add an employee , name and surname has numbers

steps.name: Navigate to Dashboard with "english" language
verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM
I click the Employee_Master_data module
I select "GESAMT FIRMEN" using the company selection button, and choose "All" using the client selection button"
I delete if in any row, surname column text is tester or developer
verify if you write tester or developer in filter surname, row1 is invisible
I delete all filter sections to start every test Scenario with a clear filter
I click the employee add button
I click active check button
I fill "Mehmet1235" "tester" "300"  "7345"  "3000"
I fill soc_no "123456789123" _postcode "71254" _holidayNumYearly "20" _travelFare "120" _fixed_allowance "100" _dispacher "ali sorumlu" _adress "musik str 10"
I see exit date input box is not functional because personal active button is checked
I see netSalary input box is still empty
I click company and choose option quickly transporte gmbh
I click Role and choose option LKW Fahrer
I click Client and choose option Hermes
I click Wage Type and choose option Full_Time
I click Tax Class and choose option 3
I click Health insurance choose Ikk Classic
I click Child allowance and choose 2
I click Chirch Tax and choose evangelishe kirchensteuer
I check buttons of meal allowance taxed_night surcharge_hourly Temp_meal allowance_night surcharge 40_ travel Fahre
I choose payment Type
I see if I filled correctly , calculate salary button becomes functional
I click save changes
I verify the alert says "Employee was added successfully"
I wait for the Url "https://qugem-staging.netlify.app/employee/"
I dont see , if  "Mehmet1235" "tester" appears in the employee table with numbers
